reference: These data were downloaded from WeatherUnderground in January 2018.
title: Weather

parameters.high_vis, avg_vis, low_vis: High, average, and low visability for the day in miles.
parameters.high_temp, avg_temp, low_temp: High, average, and low temperature for the day in degrees F.
parameters.high_wind, avg_wind, low_wind: High, average, and low wind speed for the day in mph.
parameters.high_dewpt, avg_dewpt, low_dewpt: High, average, and low dew point for the day in degrees F.
parameters.high_hg, avg_hg, low_hg: High, average, and low sea level pressure in inches of mercury.
parameters.events: Character string naming weather events on the day (Rain, Fog, Snow, etc.)
parameters.high_humidity, avg_humidity, low_humidit: High, average, and low relative humidity.
parameters.precip: Precipitation for the day – a character vale; T means "trace amount".

format: A data frame with weather-related variables for several world cities.
